tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  population_size INT,
  habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_population (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(100),
  population_size INT,
  habitat_id INT,
  last_observed DATETIME
)

CREATE TABLE wildlife_habitat (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  habitat_name VARCHAR(100),
  habitat_description TEXT,
  habitat_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE Species (
 species_id SERIAL,
 species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 population_size INT,
 habitat_type VARCHAR(255),
 PRIMARY KEY (species_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE Habitat (
 habitat_id SERIAL,
 habitat_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 location VARCHAR(255),
 habitat_area DOUBLE PRECISION,
 PRIMARY KEY (habitat_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE Population (
 population_id SERIAL,
 species_id INT,
 habitat_id INT,
 population_count INT,
 observation_date DATE,
 PRIMARY KEY (population_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES Habitat(habitat_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE Conservation (
 conservation_id SERIAL,
 species_id INT,
 conservation_status VARCHAR(255),
 conservation_actions TEXT,
 PRIMARY KEY (conservation_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE ConservationEfforts (
	effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	effort_type VARCHAR(50),
	effort_description TEXT,
	habitat_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES Habitat(habitat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BiodiversityData (
	data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	species_name VARCHAR(50),
	population_size INT,
	habitat_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES Habitat(habitat_id)
);
